Uses of Interface
android.text.Spanned

Packages that use Spanned
android.text Provides classes used to render or track text and text spans on the screen. 
android.text.method Provides classes that monitor or modify keypad input. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of Spanned in android.text
 

Subinterfaces of Spanned in android.text
 interface Editable
          This is the interface for text whose content and markup can be changed (as opposed to immutable text like Strings).
 interface Spannable
          This is the interface for text to which markup objects can be attached and detached.
 

Classes in android.text that implement Spanned
(package private) static class Layout.SpannedEllipsizer
           
 class SpannableString
          This is the class for text whose content is immutable but to which markup objects can be attached and detached.
 class SpannableStringBuilder
          This is the class for text whose content and markup can both be changed.
 class SpannedString
          This is the class for text whose content and markup are immutable.

          Returns displayable styled text from the provided HTML string.
